resources.string:
Delay is an app for breaking muscle-memory app-use habits by decoupling the physical action from the neurological reward.


Choose an installed app from the list to create a homescreen launcher shortcut, opening the app after a brief delay. Use this time to be mindful of your media consumption!


Delete the original app shortcut (long press and drag) to replace it with the newly created shorcut.


https://github.com/revan/delay
